import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { injectIntl } from "react-intl"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { FormattedMessage } from "react-intl"; import generatePID from "../../../../Common/Util/PIDGenerator"; import googleIcon from "../../../../Image/google-play-icon@2x.png"; import wizschoolLogo from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-wizschool.png"; import judge01 from "../../../../Image/challange_judge_01.png"; import judge02 from "../../../../Image/challange_judge_02.png"; import judge03 from "../../../../Image/challange_judge_03.png"; import judge04 from "../../../../Image/challange_judge_04.png"; import judge05 from "../../../../Image/challange_judge_05.png"; import judge06 from "../../../../Image/challange_judge_06.png"; import sponsorLogo01 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-1@2x.png"; import sponsorLogo02 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-2@2x.png"; import sponsorLogo03 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-3@2x.png"; import sponsorLogo04 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-4@2x.png"; import sponsorLogo05 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-5@2x.png"; import sponsorLogo06 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-6@2x.png"; import sponsorLogoMobile01 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-1-m.png"; import sponsorLogoMobile02 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-2-m.png"; import sponsorLogoMobile03 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-3-m.png"; import sponsorLogoMobile04 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-4-m.png"; import sponsorLogoMobile05 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-5-m.png"; import sponsorLogoMobile06 from "../../../../Image/challenge-logo-6-m.png"; import "./index.scss"; class index extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {}; } onClickWizlabTemplate = (id) => { const { userinfo } = this.props; const pId = generatePID(userinfo.email); if (userinfo.id) { window.open(`/builder/${pId}/${id}`, "_blank"); } else { window.open(`/builder?t=${id}`, "_blank"); } } render() { return ( <>

{this.onClickWizlabTemplate(54)}} />
{this.onClickWizlabTemplate(53)}} />
{this.onClickWizlabTemplate(55)}} />

) } } export default connect( state => ({ userinfo: state.userinfo }), {} )(withRouter(injectIntl(index)));
